column4: good morning everyone, I have a slight problem upgrading to 7.04, as my gzip does not accept one file, i guess during md5 check. any helpful ideas how to bypass that check and make the upgrade work?
this message appears during upgrade: Failed to fetch http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/edgy/multiverse/binary-i386/Packages.gz El subproceso gzip devolvi un cdigo de error (1)
and this appears in console: extracting '/tmp/tmpDNSe4y/feisty.tar.gz'
are you familiar with the command-line ?
i will use nautilus to look into the dir
does it have 'multiverse' in the name?
